chargeHist.descr: 1st Degree Child Sex Assault - Sexual Contact with Person under Age of 13

result.execSummary:
The defendant Joseph R Moldrem was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 3rd Degree Sexual Assault, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3).
  • Causing Mental Harm to Child, a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.04(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Chippewa County Clerk of Circuit Court

miscConds.notes:
$250 represents DNA surcharge.  Plus supervision fees.  PAYABLE TO CLERK OF COURTS OFFICE - 30 days to pay or request a payment plan. Due 2/9/2018.
All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

Any assessment and counseling as required and follow through and complete all required treatment, including sex offender treatment if agent finds appropriate.
Cooperate with AODA treatment.

No contact with: the victim (M.N.H.) or her family.
No unsupervised contact with anyone under the age of 18.

Comply with sex offender registration requirements.  
Submit a DNA sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

superMiscConds.notes: Any assessment and counseling as required and follow through and complete all required treatment, including sex offender treatment.

Not to possess or consume any alcohol.
Not to possess or consume any illegal drugs.
Not to possess or consume any controlled substance not prescribed by authorized medical personnel.
Not to go on any premises where primary purpose is the sale of alcohol.
Not to possess any drug paraphernalia.
Not to possess syringes unless medically required.
No association with anyone using or possessing illegal drugs.
No contact with: M.N.H. (9/18/2006), J. Dodge or N. Kolb.
Unpaid costs reduced to civil judgment.

supervisions.notes: To comply with Sex Offender Registration for 15 years per Wis. Stat. 301.45.
